Jargon Term: were never in any respiratory compromise

Jargon Term: You are also being given prescriptions for stool softeners since iron can make you constipated.

Jargon Term: Please note that you will be discharged with a prescription for a steroid taper.

Jargon Term: It is very important that you take these, as well as all of your previous medications, as prescribed.

Jargon Term: Please keep all of your outpatient appointments.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: If you experience any further shortness of breath, facial or mouth swelling, or any symptoms which disturb you, please call your doctor, consider using an epipen, or go to the ER.
